com.lavanya.escalade.controller

Class CommentMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.escalade.controller.CommentMainController

  • @Controller
public class CommentMainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to Comment object.
    Author:
    lavanya

    • Method Detail

      • saveComment

        @PostMapping(value="/saveComment")
public java.lang.String saveComment(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="comment")
                                                                        @Valid Comment comment,
                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                        @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                        MyUserDetails userConnected)
        POST request to send data to /saveComment endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save a comment in database.
        Parameters:
        comment - the object Comment that needs to be saved.
        result - represents binding results, registers errors and allows for a Validator to be applied.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails.
        Returns:
        the url /site.

      • updateComment

        @PostMapping(value="/updateComment")
public java.lang.String updateComment(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="comment")
                                                                            @Valid Comment comment,
                                                                            org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                            @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                            MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST request to send data to /updateComment endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to update a comment in database.
        Parameters:
        comment - the object Comment to update.
        result - represents binding results, registers errors and allows for a validator to be applied.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails.
        Returns:
        the url /site.

      • deleteComment

        @PostMapping(value="/deleteComment")
public java.lang.String deleteComment(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                            @ModelAttribute(value="commentToDelete")
                                                                            Comment comment)
        This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to delete a comment from database.
        Parameters:
        comment - the object Comment to delete.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        the url /site.
